import React from 'react'; import { Table } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import './Modal.css'; const ProductTable = ({ products }) => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const [modelData, setModelData] = useState([]) const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const openModal = (data) => { setShow(true) setModelData(data) } return (
{products.map((product, index) => ( ))}
# Product Name Description Price Category Subcategory Quantity Image Edit
{index + 1} {product.productName} {product.description} Rs {product.price}/- {product.category} {product.subcategory} {product.quantity}
Edit user
Product Name setProductName(e.target.value)} /> Category {categoryData.map((category) => ( ))} Subcategory setSubcategory(e.target.value)} > {filteredProducts.map((category) => ( ))} {/* {subCategoryData.filter(subcat=>subcat.categoryId===categoryId) .map((subcat) => ( ))} */} Description setDescription(e.target.value)} /> price
setPrice(e.target.value)} />
Quantity
setQuantity(parseInt(e.target.value))} />
Select Image setImage(e.target.files[0])} />
); }; export default ProductTable;
